metadata.title: Return an Item | Coello Help
metadata.description: Start a return or exchange for your Coello one-sleeve essential in a few quick steps.

title: Return or exchange an item
description: Log your return, print a label, and choose between refund, exchange, or instant credit.

steps.title: Request
steps.description: Submit your order number and select refund or exchange.

steps.title: Pack
steps.description: Seal the garment in its original bag with the authenticity card.

steps.title: Hand off
steps.description: Drop at your chosen courier or book a DPD collection slot.

steps.title: Refund
steps.description: We issue refunds in 3-5 days or dispatch exchanges instantly.
